### About this site

The website mainly consists of three pages: an introductory landing page, a resume page with description of my academic and professional experiences, and a flexdashboard page including three types of plots analyzing dataset Instacart.

When creating the three plots for dataset Instacart, plotly in library plotly was used for making the plots after cleaning the dataset using functions in tidyverse package.
